thread.section_title: Hotel Square Louvois - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: a beautiful place
thread.title_full: a beautiful place - Review of Hotel Square Louvois, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: cynthiabV2775MA
title: a beautiful place
text:
just had an amazing time at the hotel le square louvois in paris. what a beautiful hotel! it has a little gym, a pool and an incredible breakfast room and also the selection is great and they even have afternoon tea. the rooms are nice and u have a lot of day light and i you need to work as i have to, you have a enough space . the bathroom is quite big for paris.
the neighborhood ist great you have a lot of restaurants and the louvre is close and also the jardin du palais royal or tuileries.
